attributes.action: Encourage the BBC to continue and develop it's independent news coverage and not to share License Fee monies with commercial stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the independent sector in UK television has always stood for funding by advertising and just because their share is dwindling due to an inability to win new viewers based on production quality that is just a demonstration of competition and so if channels dwindle then the best will survive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
